identified-content.person: BARTELS, DR. ISMEE AMIEL (DR. ISMEE AMIEL WILLIAMS)

block.p: Dr. Ismee Amiel Bartels, the daughter of Dr. Isis Bartels and Donald Bartels of Weston, Conn., was married on Monday to Marc Onixt Williams, the son of Michele and James Williams of New York. The Rev. Michael Zeman, a Congregational minister, performed the nondenominational ceremony at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y.
The couple graduated magna cum laude from Amherst College, where they met.

Dr. Ismee Amiel Bartels, the daughter of Dr. Isis Bartels and Donald Bartels of Weston, Conn., was married on Monday to Marc Onixt Williams, the son of Michele and James Williams of New York. The Rev. Michael Zeman, a Congregational minister, performed the nondenominational ceremony at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y.
The couple graduated magna cum laude from Amherst College, where they met.

Dr. Williams, 27, is a resident in pediatrics at Babies and Children's Hospital of New York Presbyterian Hospital. She received her medical degree from Tufts University. Her father is a consultant to the board of education in Wanaque, N.J. Her mother is a pediatrician and a senior partner at Willows Pediatrics in Westport, Conn.

Mr. Williams, 26, is an associate at Davis Polk & Wardwell, the New York law firm. He received a law degree magna cum laude from Harvard. His mother is a vice president for estate planning at Citibank in New York. His father is a special patent counsel at the law firm of Sullivan & Cromwell in New York.
